artist: Designer: James Hall Bevington; Manufacturer: Richard Elliott Co.
description: small brown pistol with minor organic design on both sides of handle
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on both sides near top of handle, inscribed: [PAT\'D]; on bottom of handle, engraved: [RICHARD ELLIOTT CO. / CHICAGO, U.S.A. (arrow) / PAT SEPT 21, 1909]; on round button-like part on one side of handle, engraved: [1/2/3/4/5/6/7]
markings: on side, on sticker: [211G 6.5.11 / Pistol Bank / Sheet Metal / 79400 AD 5435 / M209-6300]
title: "Pistol" mechanical bank
